title: 6. Branch
content:
IF SILARO MAKO IS IN PLAY, GO TO 53.6IF TALA THE RED IS IN PLAY, GO TO 84.9OTHERWISE, READ:

The town of Branch spreads out among the trunks and branches of the giant cedar trees and tough, wrinkled dolewoods. The whole village is a maze of platforms and narrow walkways, all created from tree branches encouraged to grow together into dense mats punctuated by spherical homes.
